oracle.pg.hbase

Class OracleVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.OracleElementBase
      • oracle.pg.common.OracleVertexBase
        • oracle.pg.hbase.OracleVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, oracle.pg.common.messages.MesgConsts, OracleElement

    public class OracleVertex
extends OracleVertexBase
implements oracle.pg.common.messages.MesgConsts
    This class implements the Blueprints Vertex and Element interface by using an Apache HBase as back-end.

      • getInstance

        public static OracleVertex getInstance(OraclePropertyGraph opg,
                                       java.lang.Long vid,
                                       boolean bCreateIfAbsentFromCache)
        Returns an instance of OracleVertex. If there is no match in the cache and bCreateIfAbsentFromCache is false, then a NULL value will be returned.
        Parameters:
        opg - the property graph where the OracleVertex instance will be obtained
        vid - the id of the vertex
        bCreateIfAbsentFromCache - if false, returns a NULL value if there is no match in the cache.
        Returns:
        a OracleVertex object.

      • getInstance

        public static OracleVertex getInstance(OraclePropertyGraph opg,
                                       java.lang.Long vid,
                                       boolean bCreateIfAbsentFromCache,
                                       boolean bSkipStoreToCache)
        Returns an instance of OracleVertex. If there is no match in the cache and bCreateIfAbsentFromCache is false, then a NULL value will be returned.If the skipStoreToCache is true, then the vertex will not be stored into the cache.
        Parameters:
        opg - the property graph where the OracleVertex instance will be obtained
        vid - the id of the vertex
        bCreateIfAbsentFromCache - if false, returns a NULL value if there is no match in the cache.
        bSkipStoreToCache - if true, the vertex instance will not be stored into the cache.
        Returns:
        a OracleVertex object.

      • getInstance

        public static OracleVertex getInstance(OraclePropertyGraph opg,
                                       java.lang.Long vid,
                                       boolean bCreateIfAbsentFromCache,
                                       boolean bSkipStoreToCache,
                                       java.lang.String label)
        Returns an instance of OracleVertex. If there is no match in the cache and bCreateIfAbsentFromCache is false, then a NULL value will be returned.If the skipStoreToCache is true, then the vertex will not be stored into the cache.
        Parameters:
        opg - the property graph where the OracleVertex instance will be obtained
        vid - the id of the vertex
        bCreateIfAbsentFromCache - if false, returns a NULL value if there is no match in the cache.
        bSkipStoreToCache - if true, the vertex instance will not be stored into the cache.
        label - the label of the vertex
        Returns:
        a OracleVertex object.
